notes.title: Authors º contributions
notes.p: VC wrote the manuscript with input by CD, GJD, NLA, DW, FC, MBC, JPD, ID, DF, JG, WJ, AL, SK, AJM, CM, LCNG, JP, JFP, PM, KR, DR, HV, JV. All consortium contributors reviewed and approved the final version of the meeting report upon which the manuscript is based. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
